languages.text: "Я много раз имела дела с подобными святошами. Какое бы великое призвание они не провозглашали своей миссией, в своей наивности они искренне полагают, что люди в них действительно нуждаются. Если собрать достаточно сирых и убогих, которые без устали будут молить нашего пророка о спасении, то он думать забудет про Горнило и миссионерство. Я знаю пару-тройку гильдий профессиональных нищих, которые рады будут предоставить нам свои услуги".

"I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."
languages.original_text: "Я много раз имела дела с подобными святошами. Какое бы великое призвание они не провозглашали своей миссией, в своей наивности они искренне полагают, что люди в них действительно нуждаются. Я знаю пару-тройку гильдий профессиональных нищих, которые рады будут предоставить нам свои услуги".

If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."

languages.text: “我以前处理过很多像他这样圣洁的救主。他们宣称的伟大使命各自不同，但所有人都真诚而天真地认为人们真的需要他们。如果我们能聚集足够多的孤儿和病人，让他们跪倒在先知面前，乞求他的拯救，那先知很快就会忘记熔炉和他的神圣使命。我知道几个职业乞丐协会，他们会很乐意为我们提供服务。”
languages.original_text: "I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."

traits.locale_text: “我以前处理过很多像他这样圣洁的救主。他们宣称的伟大使命各自不同，但所有人都真诚而天真地认为人们真的需要他们。如果我们能聚集足够多的孤儿和病人，让他们跪倒在先知面前，乞求他的拯救，那先知很快就会忘记熔炉和他的神圣使命。我知道几个职业乞丐协会，他们会很乐意为我们提供服务。”

languages.text: «He tenido amplia experiencia con santos salvadores como él en el pasado. Sea cual sea la gran causa que proclaman como su misión, creen genuina e ingenuamente que la gente realmente les necesita. Si reunimos a suficientes huérfanos y leprosos que se desvivan por implorar la salvación de nuestro profeta, pronto se olvidará por completo del Crisol y de su santa misión. Conozco algunos gremios de mendigos profesionales que estarían encantados de ofrecernos sus servicios».
languages.original_text: "I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."

traits.locale_text: «He tenido amplia experiencia con santos salvadores como él en el pasado. Sea cual sea la gran causa que proclaman como su misión, creen genuina e ingenuamente que la gente realmente les necesita. Si reunimos a suficientes huérfanos y leprosos que se desvivan por implorar la salvación de nuestro profeta, pronto se olvidará por completo del Crisol y de su santa misión. Conozco algunos gremios de mendigos profesionales que estarían encantados de ofrecernos sus servicios».

languages.text: 「私は過去に彼のような聖人救世主とともに多くの経験を積んできた。どんな大義名分を掲げようとも、彼らは純粋に、素朴に、民が本当に自分らを必要としていると信じているのだ。私たちが、迅速で真摯に預言者に救いを求めてくれる十分な数の孤児やハンセン病患者を集めれば、彼はすぐに坩堝のことも、聖なる使命のこともすっかり忘れてしまうだろう。喜んで奉仕してくれる専門の物乞いギルドに心当たりがある」
languages.original_text: "I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."

traits.locale_text: 「私は過去に彼のような聖人救世主とともに多くの経験を積んできた。どんな大義名分を掲げようとも、彼らは純粋に、素朴に、民が本当に自分らを必要としていると信じているのだ。私たちが、迅速で真摯に預言者に救いを求めてくれる十分な数の孤児やハンセン病患者を集めれば、彼はすぐに坩堝のことも、聖なる使命のこともすっかり忘れてしまうだろう。喜んで奉仕してくれる専門の物乞いギルドに心当たりがある」

languages.text: « Je ne connais que trop bien les sauveurs de la foi dans son genre. Quelle que soit la cause qu'ils revendiquent, ils croient tous sincèrement, et naïvement, que le reste de l'univers ne pourrait se passer d'eux. Si nous rassemblons suffisamment d'orphelins et de lépreux prêts à se sacrifier pour implorer le salut de notre prophète, cet individu oubliera bien vite le Creuset et sa sainte mission. Je connais plusieurs guildes de mendiants professionnels qui seraient ravies de nous proposer leurs services. »
languages.original_text: "I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne connais que trop bien les sauveurs de la foi dans son genre. Quelle que soit la cause qu'ils revendiquent, ils croient tous sincèrement, et naïvement, que le reste de l'univers ne pourrait se passer d'eux. Si nous rassemblons suffisamment d'orphelins et de lépreux prêts à se sacrifier pour implorer le salut de notre prophète, cet individu oubliera bien vite le Creuset et sa sainte mission. Je connais plusieurs guildes de mendiants professionnels qui seraient ravies de nous proposer leurs services. »

languages.text: "Ich habe reichlich Erfahrung mit frömmelnden Erlösern wie ihm. Welche hehre Sache sie auch zu ihrer Mission erklären, sie glauben tatsächlich naiverweise, dass die Leute sie brauchen würden. Wenn wir genügend Waisen und Leprakranke versammeln, die unseren Propheten leidenschaftlich um Erlösung anzuflehen, dann vergisst den Tiegel und seine heilige Mission in Windeseile. Ich kenne einige Gilden professioneller Bettler, die entzückt wären, uns ihre Dienste anzubieten."
languages.original_text: "I have had ample experience with saintly saviours like him in the past. Whatever great cause they proclaim as their mission, they genuinely, naively believe that people really do need them. If we round up enough orphans and lepers who would trip over themselves to beg our prophet for salvation, he will soon forget all about the Crucible and his holy mission. I know a few guilds of professional beggars who would be delighted to offer their services to us."
